headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Vengeance is Sweet
content: Floating fortress, crime lab in the sky, death-spitting collateral damage producer: the Avenger is all these things and more, a one-stop-shop for the kingpin in search of the most terrifying object ever to take to the skies. Store it in your facility, get it fitted out with a Vehicle Mod Shop, a Weapon Workshop, and a whole suite of ferocious weapon upgrades, and youâ€™ll soon be wreaking a whole new level of havoc without ever having to land.
